Name: Succubus Affection
About the game: In a world inhabited by human-like monsters. A young man lives peacefully in a remote village with his sister, helping run errands for her. However, the monsters outside the village attack him on sight. Steeling himself, he begins to work towards getting stronger, so he can protect those who are dear to him. Features: A Side-scrolling Action RPG Skill Equip System Multiple Difficulty Settings Befriend Monsters Gather Ingredients and Cook Food for Buffs
